title: Rename and brand the app as “yourlove”

requirements.text: Update the app’s user-facing branding text to use the website/app name “yourlove”, replacing existing “Valentine Invitation Builder”/similar app-name strings in the UI while keeping the existing Valentine invitation functionality unchanged.

quotes: Create app for my website named yourlove

acceptanceCriteria: The main builder page heading currently shown as “Valentine Invitation Builder” is updated to “yourlove”.
The footer copyright/app name text is updated to “yourlove”.
No Valentine invitation creation, publish/share, or invitation viewing behavior is removed or broken.

requirements.text: Update the HTML document title (browser tab title) to “yourlove”.

quotes: Create app for my website named yourlove

acceptanceCriteria: The page <title> shown in the browser tab is “yourlove”.

constraints: Backend must remain a single Motoko actor (all logic in backend/main.mo); only add migration code if a state upgrade is required.

Do not edit frontend immutable paths: frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.ts, frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.tsx, frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts, frontend/src/main.tsx, frontend/src/components/ui (compose instead).
Use English for any user-facing text.
nonGoals: Adding new invitation features or changing the existing Valentine invitation builder/share flow.
Changing authentication behavior or replacing Internet Identity.
Introducing new backend storage models beyond what is required for renaming/branding.
